hero.title: Lan Wei
hero.description:
I am a PhD student at the Multi-Scale Embodied Intelligence Lab, Imperial College London, supervised by Dr Dandan Zhang. My current research focuses on diffusion-based sim-to-real image generation and efficient vision–language–action models to enable reliable, data-efficient robot perception and control, particularly for visuo-tactile interaction and biomedical robotics.

I received my M.E. degree in Computer Science from the University of Science and Technology of China in 2024, after I obtained my B.E. degree in Computer Science from Xiamen University in 2021.
